summary: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational, and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
cast: Bill Hader|Anna Faris|James Caan|Will Forte|Andy Samberg|Benjamin Bratt|Neil Patrick Harris|Terry Crews|Kristen Schaal|Cody Cameron|Melissa Sturm|Kris Pearn|Craig Kellman|Khamani Griffin|Bridget Hoffman|Al Roker|Steve Alterman|June Christopher|David Cowgill|Eddie Frierson|Elisa Gabrielli|Jackie Gonneau|Tania Gunadi|Wendy Hoffman|Walter Jones|Ashley Lambert|Scott Menville|David Sheinkopf|Peter Siragusa|Marina Squerciati|Kelly Stables|Shane Sweet|Maddie Taylor|Joe Lewis
